name: 王耀德
objective:
讓同學了解電磁學之基本觀念與應用，全學年課程內容將包括：
上學期：1. 向量分析 2. 靜電學 3. 電位 4. 物質內的電場 5. 靜磁學
下學期：6. 物質內的磁場 7. 電磁感應與時變場 8. 馬克斯方程式與守恆律 9. 電磁波 及其傳播特性 10. 電磁波於介面的行為
schedule:
week 1: Introduction
week 1~5: Vector analysis
week 5~8: Electrostatics
week 8~12: Potentials
(week 9 or 10: midterm exam.)
week 12~14: Electric Fields in Matter
week 14~17: Magnetostatics
week 18: final exam.
scorePolicy:
quizzes: 15% x 2
midterm: 25%
final: 25%
homeworks and homework tests: 20%
participation: extra 10%
materials:
* main text: Introduction to Electrodynamics, 4th ed., by David J. Griffiths
* for applications and practices: Field and Wave Electromagnetics, 2nd ed., by        David K. Cheng
* 自編上課講義
